operations with pcntr collections
[variable production line (pcntr)]


Functions

bool surfit::pcntrs_delall ()
 removes all elements from flow_pcntrs collection
bool surfit::pcntrs_del (int pos)
 removes production contour from flow_pcntrs collection at 'pos' position
bool surfit::pcntrs_read (const char *filename, const char *pcntrname, int columns, int col1, int col2, int col3, const char *delimiter, int grow_by)
 reads production contour from formatted text file and adds it to flow_pcntrs collection
bool surfit::pcntrs_load (const char *filename, const char *pcntrname)
 reads production contour from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to flow_pcntrs collection
pcntr * surfit::pcntrs_at (int pos)
 returns pcntr at 'pos' position in flow_pcntrs collection
pcntr * surfit::pcntrs_first ()
 returns first pcntr in flow_pcntrs collection
pcntr * surfit::pcntrs_last ()
 returns last pcntr flow_pcntrs collection
int surfit::pcntrs_size ()
 returns amount of elements in flow_pcntrs collection
int surfit::pcntrs_info ()
 prints information about all production contours in flow_pcntrs collection
